external knowledge.from sentence: In this paper we enrich neural - network - based NLI models with external knowledge in coattention , local inference collection , and inference composition components .

state - of - the - art NLI models.from sentence: We show the proposed model improves the state - of - the - art NLI models to achieve better performances on the SNLI and MultiNLI datasets .

external knowledge.from sentence: The advantage of using external knowledge is more significant when the size of training data is restricted , suggesting that if more knowledge can be obtained , it may bring more benefit .
